name: G Social Buttons
author: Sinan Yorulmaz

sections.description: G Social Buttons is a plug-in that allows you to add simple social media icons and increase the social media interaction of your website. There is also a mobile call pickup button.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

Once you have entered the WordPress panel, you can automatically install the plugin by searching for “G Social Buttons” in the “Install Add-ons” page.

Manual Installation

  1. Load the “g-social-buttons” folder in the ZIP file you downloaded into the “wp-content/plugins” folder in the directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. From your WordPress panel, go to the “Plugins” page and activate the “G Social Buttons” plugin.

It’s that easy! Now when you enter the edit page of any of your content, you can see the “G Social Buttons” box at the bottom of your page.
sections.faq:
Is there a setting panel?

Yes there is.

I do not see GSB plugin under some content?

This is normal, as there may be different “Post Types” depending on the theme you are using. If you add these Post Types by entering the GSB plugin’s settings panel, the plugin box will appear.
